EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal for a 2-day Microservices Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 14-15, 2017 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Crown@Robinson 140 Robinson Road Level 16 Singapore 068907
REGISTER <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/migrating-a-monolith-app-to-microservices-singapore-tickets-32222001875]]>
The ability to deliver software has now become a critical requirement for survival in today’s business world.
Companies need to build better software faster to compete. Can your development team move from an idea to production in one motion—in a matter of weeks or days?
Existing monolithic applications, legacy platforms and lengthy operational deployment cycles are holding innovation back. Learn how companies are removing the innovation barrier by moving to a cloud-native approach for the software delivery lifecycle.
Join us <[[http://pivotal.io/event/migrating-to-microservices-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=sg-workshop-q116]]> for a two-day workshop and learn how companies are deploying software in weeks vs. months using a cloud-native platform. In this 2-day workshop, you will:
- Learn how to build your own microservices - Start with a monolith application and migrate it step-by-step to microservices following cloud-native best practices
This training class will be completely hands-on with no fluff. You will need to bring your own laptop and be experienced with Java.
We will use Java 8, Spring, Spring Data, JPA, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Cloud Foundry, Neo4J and MongoDB.
Register Today <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/migrating-a-monolith-app-to-microservices-singapore-tickets-32222001875]]>. Seats are extremely limited. Pre-Requisites:
- Must be experienced in Java - Bring your own laptop with at least 8GB RAM
